summary: From the first moment I wrote a few lines of code to print out the world "Hello World" on a DOS screen, I thought it was nifty. It kickstarted a lifetime passion for computer programming; first as a college major, then as a hobby and finally the focus for a career . After being introduced to different aspects and applications of programming, I become more interested in the growth of websites and web development in general. Its growth and widespread effect on society astound me. So I took a web development course from a coding bootcamp and joined the world of web development. as a Full Stack Web Developer.
